page.title: 06Brookmans Park and Nepal
page.content: 1985 is a year in which England and other countries are trying to help the third world countries.Brookmans Park chose to help Nepal.We are helping by sponsoring an engineer and a nurse to live in Nepal.The engineer is teaching the people to mend simple machinery and the nurse is trying to improve the health in Nepal. To make people think of Nepal,six Gurkha soldiers came over to Village Day.There have also been lots more money raising activites,such as a Nepalese evening where Nepalese type food was served and many other events that will raise money for the families in Nepal.It is very appropriate for Brookmans Park to help Nepal because we are a well off area and Nepal is very poor.
